00023 #include <ProgressCounters.hpp>
00024 #include <utils.hpp>
00025 #include <cmath>

00028 namespace loos {
00029 
00030   void SimpleCounter::attach(ObsT* obs) { observers.push_back(obs); }
00031   void SimpleCounter::detach(ObsT* obs) {
00032     Observers::iterator i = std::find(observers.begin(), observers.end(), obs);
00033     if (i == observers.end())
00034       throw(std::logic_error("Attempting to detach an observer that was never attached"));
00035     observers.erase(i);
00036   }
00037 
00038   void SimpleCounter::notify(void) {
00039     Observers::iterator i;
00040     for (i = observers.begin(); i != observers.end(); ++i)
00041       (*i)->update(this);
00042   }
00043 
00044   void SimpleCounter::finish(void) {
00045     timer_.stop();
00046     Observers::iterator i;
00047     for (i = observers.begin(); i != observers.end(); ++i)
00048       (*i)->finish(this);
00049   }
00050 
00051   void SimpleCounter::start(void) {
00052     count_ = 0;
00053     timer_.start();
00054     Observers::iterator i;
00055     for (i = observers.begin(); i != observers.end(); ++i)
00056       (*i)->start(this);
00057   }
00058 
00059   
00060   uint SimpleCounter::count(void) const { return(count_); }
00061   double SimpleCounter::elapsed(void) { return(timer_.elapsed()); }
00062 
00063   uint SimpleCounter::remaining(void) { throw(std::logic_error("remaining() is unimplemented")); }
00064 
00065   double SimpleCounter::timeRemaining(void) { throw(std::logic_error("timeRemaining() is unimplemented")); }
00066 
00067   double SimpleCounter::fractionComplete(void) { throw(std::logic_error("fractionComplete() is unimplemented")); }

00072   // ----------------------------------------------------------
00073 
00074   void EstimatingCounter::setExpected(uint n) { expected = n; }
00075   uint EstimatingCounter::remaining(void) { return(expected - count_); }
00076   double EstimatingCounter::timeRemaining(void) {
00077     double avg = timer_.elapsed() / count_;
00078     return(remaining() * avg);
00079   }
00080 
00081   double EstimatingCounter::fractionComplete(void) { return(static_cast<double>(count_) / expected); }
00082

00084   // ----------------------------------------------------------
00085 
00086   void BasicProgress::start(SimpleCounter*) { os_ << prefix_; }
00087   void BasicProgress::update(SimpleCounter*) { os_ << msg_; }
00088   void BasicProgress::finish(SimpleCounter*) { os_ << suffix_; }
00089 
00090   // ----------------------------------------------------------
00091 
00092   void PercentProgress::update(SimpleCounter* s) {
00093     uint i = static_cast<uint>(floor(s->fractionComplete() * 100.0));
00094     os_ << i << "% " << msg_ << std::endl;
00095   }
00096 
00097   void PercentProgress::finish(SimpleCounter* s) {
00098     os_ << suffix_;
00099     os_ << "Total elapsed time was " << timeAsString(s->elapsed()) << std::endl;
00100   }
00101 
00102   // -----------------------------------------------------------
00103 
00104   void PercentProgressWithTime::update(SimpleCounter* s) {
00105     uint i = static_cast<uint>(floor(s->fractionComplete() * 100.0));
00106     os_ << i << "% " << msg_ << " (" << timeAsString(s->timeRemaining()) << " remaining)\n";
00107   }
00108 
00109   void PercentProgressWithTime::finish(SimpleCounter* s) {
00110     os_ << suffix_;
00111     os_ << "Total elapsed time was " << timeAsString(s->elapsed()) << std::endl;
00112   }
